definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: As it approaches the sea, the river meanders over the coastal plain.
sentences.chinese: 快要入海時，印度河在沿海平原裏蜿蜒流淌。

sentences.english: A network of canals connects the Indus to the nearby lake, which also appears flooded.
sentences.chinese: 連接印度河與附近湖泊的河網，也同樣漲起洪水。

sentences.english: However, he was registered at the Indian Creek School in Tunica as Robert Spencer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他註冊丘尼卡羅伯特斯賓塞在印度河學校。

sentences.english: Devastating floods last year highlighted the benefits of dams on the Indus.
sentences.chinese: 去年破壞嚴重的洪水突顯了在印度河建造大壩的好處。

definition: Syr Darya, Central Asian river, flowing from Kyrgiz Republic through Kazakhstan to the Aral sea

Amu Darya, the biggest river of Central Asia, from Pamir to Aral sea, forming the boundary between Afghanistan and Tajikistan then flowing through Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan/formerly called Oxus by Greek and Western writers, and Gihon by medieval Islamic writers
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)

pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4

definition: Salween river, flowing from Tibet into Myanmar
Lake Victoria or Victoria Nyanza, Kenya, on the White Nile
the Ferghana Valley in modern Uzbekistan
pinyin: Fei4 er3 gan4 na4 Pen2 di4
